form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: KRISHAN S. KRISHNA, M.D., Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023 KRIS AN S. KRISHNA, M.D. INTERNAL MEDICINE & CARDIOLOGY November 20, 1998 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: RE: Sheila Bakhshi Shiela Bakhshi is a 83 year old female who is originally from India and only speaks little English and has been under my care for more then ten years. Patient has been treated for the following conditions 1. ASHD with a history of Angina Pectoris, Hypertension and Cardiac Arrhythmia 2. Cancer of the left breast with treatment, S/P left breast mastectomy. Patient is been treated with radiation and chemotherapy. 3. Severe Deg. Arthritis. Specially in the knees and in the neck. 4. History of glaucoma and cataracts in both eyes 5. History of kidney stones. Surgical removal of kidney stones. About fifteen year back from the left side. 6. Duislipidemia with mild hypercholesterolemia. 7. History of dizziness with detorating memory and comprehension. Sheila Bakhshi has multiple medical problems has been recently hospitalized, has been disabled, has been using a wheel chair and is taking medication for above mention illness. If any further information is needed and any question S regarding her health please feel free to call me. Sincerely, K Vms Krishan S. Krishna 3356 W. BALL ROAD, SUITE 210, ANAHEIM, CA 92804 (714) 826-0910
